about_the_game: Try Digital Humans – Full Experience for 3 Hours!Get the 3-hour trial of the Early Access version of Digital Humans! Explore fully interactive AI-driven characters with advanced speech and animation, offering natural conversations and immersive interactions. Explore, experiment, and see what makes Digital Humans unique before committing to the unlimited experience!
detailed_description: Try Digital Humans – Full Experience for 3 Hours!Get the 3-hour trial of the Early Access version of Digital Humans! Explore fully interactive AI-driven characters with advanced speech and animation, offering natural conversations and immersive interactions. Explore, experiment, and see what makes Digital Humans unique before committing to the unlimited experience!
legal_notice: Digital Humans is built with Meta Llama 3
name: Digital Humans Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 3-hour trial of the Early Access version of Digital Humans! Engage with advanced AI characters through immersive, voice-enabled dialogues, from light-hearted banter to thought-provoking discussions.
